When [[Kimimaro]] enters the second level of his [[Cursed Seal of Earth|cursed seal]], his spine grows longer to give him a tail-like appendage. For this technique, Kimimaro removes that spine to use as a weapon. [[Wikipedia:Cartilage|Cartilage]] between the individual vertebrae makes the spine flexible for use as a [[Wikipedia:whip|whip]], and the cartilage can be stretched further to increase the whip's range.<ref name="d2"/> The vertebrae are also modified to have spikes, making it easier for them to hook into targets. When this spine whip is wrapped around a target, it holds them in place, making it easier to kill them with [[Dance of the Clematis: Flower]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 216</ref>

== Trivia ==
* [[Wikipedia:Clematis florida|''Clematis florida'']] is of the genus [[Wikipedia:clematis|clematis]]. It's a perennial ivy that grows flowers coloured white or deep purple.<ref>''[[Tō no Sho]]'', page 207</ref>
